waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers

Class LayerPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.Layer
      • waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.LayerPool

  • public class LayerPool
extends Layer
    This is the class for the pooling layers. It extends the Layer class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int poolSize
      The size of the receptive field.
      private int stride
